definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Be understanding if you or your loved one is upset.
sentences.chinese: 你或者你的挚爱焦躁时，要学着理解通融。

sentences.english: My most sincere loving a lifetime man , Yan Yang .
sentences.chinese: 皒一生最挚爱的男亽，颜阳。

sentences.english: They asked me how I knew my true love was true.
sentences.chinese: 他们问我怎么知道我的挚爱对我永远忠贞不二的。

sentences.english: I have love in my life, a soul mate-absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 我已经拥有生命挚爱，一个绝对的灵魂伴侣。

sentences.english: The devotion of the aged couple is inspiring.
sentences.chinese: 老人的挚爱是催人奋进的。

sentences.english: Such a petition, fervently presented, will elevate the spirit of all your devotions .
sentences.chinese: 如此热诚呈献的祷词将提升你挚爱之灵。

sentences.english: Because of you are that my lifetime is middle most ?
sentences.chinese: 因为妳饣皒一生中最挚爱的男亽。

sentences.english: Eason chan of singing of love is a kind of pure love .
sentences.chinese: 陈奕迅对歌唱的挚爱是一种纯真的爱。

sentences.english: Best Regards To Daffy Tong and his Beloved Leslie Cheung.
sentences.chinese: 最好的祝愿赠与唐鹤德师长和他的挚爱张国荣师长。

sentences.english: My work is to weep at night in remembering my Beloved;
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是晚间因忆念我的挚爱而流泪。

sentences.english: Its fabulous parks are loved by Londoners all year round.
sentences.chinese: 它神话般的公园每年都是伦敦人的挚爱。

sentences.english: After his death, devotion to Nicholas extended to all parts of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 尼古拉死后，人们对他的挚爱延伸到欧洲各地。

sentences.english: I just come to say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 我是来说再见的曾挚爱的珎。

sentences.english: I took this photo at Gagosian Gallery with my beloved Hasselblad camera.
sentences.chinese: 我在纽约用我挚爱的哈苏拍下了这张照片。

sentences.english: She said she is the woman the businessman truly loves, but he didn't meet her before he married.
sentences.chinese: 她说她是他的挚爱，只是恨不相逢未娶时。

sentences.english: We all know of a cliff by the north of our beloved island of Saipan.
sentences.chinese: 我们都知道，在我们挚爱的塞班岛北边有一座悬崖。

definition: to treasure/to be very fond of
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)
